title: Stairway to Heaven
resume: Stairway to Heaven is a 2003 South Korean television series starring Choi Ji-woo, Kwon Sang-woo, Kim Tae-hee, and Shin Hyun-joon. It aired on SBS from December 3, 2003 to February 5, 2004 on Wednesdays and Thursdays at 21:55 for 20 episodes. The hit drama received an average viewership rating of 38.8%, and 45.3% for the finale.
